mean_en: a feeling or belief that bad things will happen in the future :a feeling or belief that what you hope for will not happen
sentence: Losing 4-0 at half time, the dressing room was filled with pessimism.
sentence_trans: 上半场以0-4落后，更衣室里充满了悲观情绪。
word_etyma: pessim最坏的 + ism主义 → 往最坏的想  → pessimism悲观主义
